description: This script verifies that the '/health' and '/debug/config' endpoints of a FastAPI application return HTTP 200 status without requiring database connectivity. It makes HTTP GET requests to the local server on a configurable port, checks the responses, and confirms that the '/health' endpoint payload contains 'status':'ok'.

methods.name: int _port()
methods.description: Retrieves the port number from environment variable 'PORT' with a default of 3001.

methods.name: None _check(path: str)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to a specified path and validates the response status and payload, especially for the '/health' endpoint.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main function that checks the '/health' and '/debug/config' endpoints and prints success message.
